extends java.lang.Object
    Sends text message to a user via email
    Author:
    Bobby Drop Tables

      This method implements the sendSMSMessage method to send text notifications to all the users on a team

      • sendSMS

        public void sendSMS(javax.mail.Session session,
           edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.core.models.User user)
        This method uses the javaMail API library to send an SMS to the user This code is inspired by http://www.mkyong.com/java/javamail-api-sending-email- via-gmail-smtp-example/
        Parameters:
        session - the session with the SMS server
        user - The user to be messaged.
